titleStmt.title: Relics of Syriac Magic: Another Syriac Bowl for Prwkzʿd br Kwmy and a Syriac Incantation Fragment in the British Museum

revisionDesc.change: CREATED: This bibl record was autogenerated from a Zotero record.

analytic.title: Relics of Syriac Magic: Another Syriac Bowl for Prwkzʿd br Kwmy and a Syriac Incantation Fragment in the British Museum

biblStruct.note: The contribution features the first editions of two unpublished Syriac incantation texts: a bowl sold at a Christie’s auction in 1974 (present whereabouts unknown), and a fragment of a Syriac bowl housed in the British Museum and not included in the catalogue of the Aramaic incantation bowls of the British Museum published in 2000.

body.bibl: Moriggi, Marco. “Relics of Syriac Magic: Another Syriac Bowl for Prwkzʿd Br Kwmy and a Syriac Incantation Fragment in the British Museum.” Folia Orientalia 61 (2024): 193–202. https://doi.org/https://doi.org/10.24425/for.2024.152391.

Marco Moriggi, Relics of Syriac Magic: Another Syriac Bowl for Prwkzʿd Br Kwmy and a Syriac Incantation Fragment in the British Museum,” Folia Orientalia 61 (2024): 193–202, https://doi.org/https://doi.org/10.24425/for.2024.152391.
